summary: An improved, good looking and useful Breezehome
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE GIVE YOUR OPINIONS ABOUT THE MOD AS A MATTER OF FEEDBACK

----------

Breezehome is one of the most used houses in Skyrim due to its location. Although this house has little features than the other houses. I planned to improve the house with Creation Kit without losing the originality of Breezehome. This mod is intended to be a LORE-FRIENDLY mod.
Here is the list of changes:

----------

LATEST VERSION is v1.21

----------

v1.21
- Added 2 more new containers to the cellar
- Added some more skill fortifying potions to the cellar
- Added some more miscellaneous items to the cellar

v1.20
- Items will properly appear according to the purchased and non-purchased upgrades
- Added more candles and readjusted the lighting in the house
- Removed smithy under the stairs and added a cellar trap door
- Cellar trap door leads you to a new room
- The cellar includes all crafting tools such as:
  - Grindstone
  - Workbench
  - Tanning Rack
  - Anvil (for crafting weapons and armor)
  - Chest (for storing player\'s items)
- The cellar also contains some handy crafting materials

v1.11
- Adjusted the extended master room\'s flooring
- Added round rugs under the mannequins
- Added Soul Gem holders around the enchantment table
- Placed a Frost Dragon mini statue beside Breezehome\'s entrance gate

v1.10
- Added 2 more new dagger racks in the loft
- Added 4 mannequins in the master bedroom
- Added 1 weapon display rack, 1 dagger rack and 1 weapon plaque in special loft room
- Added a new food table in the special loft room
- Changed dresser\'s place by placing near the bed
- Adjusted some more decorations\' position and angle

v1.00
- Added 5 new weapon racks near the stairs
- Added 2 weapon plaques in Lydia\'s room
- Added 2 dagger racks on the table that is in the loft
- Added 1 new chest in the master bedroom
- Added Enchanting table in the laboratory
- Added workbench and grindstone under the stairs
- Added few candles and adjusted the lighting effects
- Added few decorations like rugs and animal trophies
- Adjusted some decorations\' position and angle
- Extended the size of the master bedroom
- Changed the beds from common to decent beds

----------

Notes:

1. Some items will only be available after purchasing the upgrades (e.g. Enchantment table will be available after purchasing Alchemy Decoration upgrade)

2. I have added a small chimney right behind Breezehome which is used to take out the smoke from the fireplace in the cellar (an act of making realistic architecture to make it look even more lore-friendly).

3. Use mannequins at your own risk. They work fine till now but since Skyrim is glitchy, mannequins can have problems such duplicate armor sets, floating, unable to activate etc.

----------

Future plans:
- Make the cellar accessible after purchasing a special key from Proventus Avenicci (price might be around 1000 gold)
- Add a tiny farm behind the house
- More lore-friendly content desired by the community

----------

IF YOU HAVE ANY NEW IDEAS FOR THIS MOD, CONTACT ME THROUGH PM. THE IDEAS MUST BE LORE FRIENDLY.

----------

I give credited to jarulf for sharing opinions and giving me feedbacks.
author: Erkan Mehmedali
